title: Overview
body:
Hi! Here you can browse and download all sheet music I've created.

Sometimes, when I can't find sheet music for a song, I decide to make it myself (if I can bring myself to work with MuseScore ಠ_ಠ) Mostly, you can find piano sheets here, but recently I've gotten into choir arrangements as well.

I've made sheet music for the following video games, animes & artists:

{{overviewNavigation}}
background: <video playsinline autoplay loop muted poster="img/index-bg.jpg"><source src="img/index-bg.mp4" type="video/mp4"></video>

title: The Witcher 3
body:
This is a piece from the original soundtrack of the action game The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt.

You can listen to the song on YouTube or download it for free on Sheethost (PDF, MIDI or MuseScore files). Have fun!

{{songs}}

title: Aurora
body:
These are some songs from the Norwegian singer Aurora Aksnes.

You can listen to each song on YouTube or download it for free on Sheethost (PDF, MIDI or MuseScore files). Have fun!

{{songs}}

title: Foxes
body:
This is a song from the album Glorious by Foxes.

Two versions are available: A short and an extended one (which has another chorus at the end and is more difficult).The background instrumental was made by _SLP.

You can listen to the song on YouTube or download it for free on Sheethost (PDF, MIDI or MuseScore files). Have fun!

{{songs}}

title: Florence + the Machine
body:
These are some songs from Florence + The Machine. Which Witch is from her third album, How Big, How Blue, How Beautiful. Moderation has been released as a single in January 2019.

The arrangement for Which Witch was made by An Almighty Sound, I've only created the sheet music for it. In the background you can hear the incredible instrumental remake made by Highway Monster.

You can listen to each song on YouTube or download it for free on Sheethost (PDF, MIDI or MuseScore files). Have fun!

{{songs}}

title: Silence
body:
This is a collection of piano sheet music I made for the original soundtrack of the adventure game Silence (also known as The Whispered World 2).

You can listen to each song on YouTube or download it for free on Sheethost (PDF, MIDI or MuseScore files). Have fun!

{{songs}}

title: Fran Bow

title: Everybody's Gone to the Rapture
body:
This is a piece from the original soundtrack of the adventure game Everybody's Gone to the Rapture.

The arrangement was made by LillyTalent, I've only created the sheet music for it.

You can listen to the song on YouTube or download it for free on Sheethost (PDF, MIDI or MuseScore files). Have fun!

title: Shinsekai yori
body:
This is a piece from the original soundtrack of the anime Shinsekai yori (also known as From the New World or 新世界より).

The arrangement was made by 陳司司, I've only created the sheet music for it.

You can listen to the song on YouTube or download it for free on Sheethost (PDF, MIDI or MuseScore files). Have fun!

songs.title: Kage no Denshouka Dainibu
songs.subtitle: 阴の伝承歌 第二部 (piano)

title: Assassin's Creed
body:
This is a piece from the original soundtrack of the action game Assassin's Creed III.

I used the melody of Pei-wen Tan's violin arrangement and OwexGoard's accompaniment.

You can listen to the song on YouTube or download it for free on Sheethost (PDF, MIDI or MuseScore files). Have fun!

{{songs}}
